name: Warwick Valley Telephone Company
overview: Warwick Valley Telephone Company provides communication services to the residential and business customers. It operates in two segments, telephone and online. The Telephone segment provides telecommunication services, including local network services, network access services, and long distance services, as well as directory services, which include publishing and sale of yellow and white page advertising in print and online; wholesale services; and voice conferencing services. It also offers billing and collections services to other carriers; and resells toll telephone services. The Online segment provides broadband and dial-up Internet access services, voice over Internet protocol services, and video over its landline network. It also offers digital television services, as well as banner advertising, domain name registration, and Web hosting services. The company provides its services in the towns of Warwick, Goshen, and Wallkill, New York; and the Townships of Vernon and West Milford, New Jersey. Warwick Valley Telephone Company was founded in 1902 and is based in Warwick, New York.
